name: Match Blox
description:
Tap or Drag the blocks to match the colours.

Win by creating matches with the blocks and deleting rows as you go to reach the bottom! Make sure you think fast as if you're too slow and the blocks reach the top then it's game over!

Match Blox features:
- Simple and satisfying gameplay
- Match coloured blocks to make them disappear
- Simple tap or drag controls depending on your preference
- Variety of different colours to unlock
- Increasingly challenging new levels to discover
